video:video.video:title: Modernizing .NET Apps with Docker, for IT Pros. Part 5.
video:video.video:description: The final video in the series showing you how production Docker deployments look in Azure. I take the same application I've used in the whole series and deploy it to a highly-available cluster of VMs&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Cognitive Services Episode 9 - Build the ultimate chatbot with Custom Speech
video:video.video:description: For this episode, I have created another chatbot that is aimed at helping factory workers to intervene on machines whenever they encounter operating problems. This factory comes with a specific jargon&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Cognitive Services Episode 8 - Leveraging speech services with chatbots
video:video.video:description: Now that we built a chatbot using most of the NLP-related APIs and that we saw how to categorize incidents based on end users screenshots thanks to the custom vision service, it's time to see how to&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep14: Gathering Stats with Application Insights

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep13: Setting and Accessing Setting from the Portal
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we'll look at how to integrate with the production environment and read settings from the portal.

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep12: Building Functions with VSTS
video:video.video:description: There is no reason to abandon standard software development practices with functions. In this episode, we explore how to build functions projects using Visual Studio Team Services.

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep11: Unit Testing Functions
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we play around with how to get unit tests running against functions. It can be slightly tricky! Here are the entries that need to be added to your testing .csproj&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep10: Using PostSharp Interceptors
video:video.video:description: There is currently no request pipeline for function apps but we can create our own by leveraging aspect-oriented programming. In this episode, we explore how PostSharp can help make function&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Function Junction Ep9: Output Bindings
video:video.video:description: Different Azure services can be coupled together using functions as the glue. In this episode, we'll talk about how to couple together blob storage and table storage.

video:video.video:title: Cognitive Services Episode 7 Leveraging custom image classifiers for Enterprise use with the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Cognitive Services Episode 6 - Document routing & tagging with the Text Analytics & the Entity&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Modernizing .NET Apps with Docker, for IT Pros. Part 3.

video:video.video:title: Modernizing .NET Apps with Docker, for IT Pros. Part 2.

video:video.video:title: At least $10,000 savings on SQL Server clustering in Microsoft Azure
video:video.video:description: Cloud surely is a convenient place for a company's IT infrastructure to dwell in, because it provides business continuity without taking much resources. However, can it really give fault-tolerance?&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Despliegue e integración contínua en Azure
video:video.video:description: Este video nos guiará en la implementación de Despliegue e Integración contínua en Azure Web Apps, explicando los conceptos de Ranuras de Implementación, Intercambio, Kudu y finalmente integrando&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Azure Web App
video:video.video:description: This tutorial shows how to deploy an ASP.NET web application to a web app in Azure App Service by using Visual Studio 2015 or Visual Studio 2013. The tutorial assumes that you are an ASP.NET developer&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Web Performance Test
video:video.video:description: Run Azure web app performance tests to check how your app handles user load. Measure response time and find failures that might indicate problems.

video:video.video:title: Azure One Step at Time - Virtual Machines
video:video.video:description: The 'One Step at a Time' series is designed teach EXACTLY One Azure feature in a few minutes time that can be useful immediately. Here, MVP Pat Tormey demonstrates how to fire up a new Azure Virtual&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Azure One Step at at Time SQL
video:video.video:description: In this concise session MVP Pat Tormey demonstrates EXACTLY ONE THING Azure, SQL in Azure. From the Azure portal dashboard Pat creates a database, configures it for remote access, shows how to get&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Custom User Controls in UWP
video:video.video:description: User Controls are custom collections of UWP, WPF or Window forms controls that encapsulate a reusable set of components with their methods, events and properties. In this short video Pat Tormey, MVP&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Consumir un Azure Mobile Service desde Windows Phone
video:video.video:description: Consumir un Azure Mobile Service desde Windows Phone y hacer operaciones a una bases de datos en SQL Azure.

video:video.video:title: Instalando FreeBSD no Hyper-V
video:video.video:description: Nesse vídeo vamos mostrar como instalar o FreeBSD no Hyper-V.

video:video.video:title: Containers rodando em Windows Server 2016 no Azure
video:video.video:description: Neste vídeo vemos como criar uma máquina virtual com Windows Server 2016 e como trabalhar com Containers.
